decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to efficiently ramp up mana through cards like Astral Cornucopia, Everflowing Chalice, and Eldrazi Temple, while controlling the board with cards like Ugin, Karn, and Mystic Forge. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy through cards like Kozilek's Command and Devourer of Destiny, while also utilizing cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Power Conduit to further control the battlefield. With the ability to generate a large amount of mana quickly, the deck can overwhelm opponents with powerful Eldrazi creatures and take control of the game.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by countering opponent's spells, using removal spells, and disrupting their hand with cards like Narset, Parter of Veils. It also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, the Mind Sculptor to maintain board advantage and generate card advantage. The deck includes powerful finishers like Terminus and Solitude to close out the game once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The mana base is designed to support the control elements of the deck while also providing flexibility in casting spells of different colors.

This deck focuses on using cards that enable the player to cycle through their deck quickly, setting up the graveyard with creatures that can be brought back with Living End to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Ardent Plea, Street Wraith, and Shardless Agent, the player can consistently get creatures into the graveyard while controlling the board with counterspells like Force of Negation. The deck also includes cards like Curator of Mysteries and Waker of Waves to provide additional value and pressure. Overall, the strategy revolves around setting up a powerful Living End combo to win the game.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. It also includes creatures like Murktide Regent and Psychic Frog to apply pressure while controlling the game. The deck has a strong mana base to support its spells, allowing for flexibility in casting a variety of powerful threats and answers. Through careful resource management and strategic decision-making, the deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver the opponent, ultimately winning through attrition and control.

The deck focuses on utilizing fast mana generation and efficient spells to quickly assemble the Goblin Charbelcher combo, which allows for a devastating one-shot kill. By casting spells like Manamorphose and Desperate Ritual, the deck can generate the necessary mana to activate Goblin Charbelcher's ability and deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Sundering Eruption helps disrupt the opponent's game plan and clear the way for the combo to go off.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while utilizing cheap, efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Mutagenic Growth to burn down opponents. With card draw and selection through Expressive Iteration and Preordain, the deck aims to maintain tempo advantage. The inclusion of Mishra's Bauble and Slickshot Show-Off provide additional value, while Stormchaser's Talent and Lava Dart offer flexibility and reach. By applying constant pressure and leveraging powerful spells, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a swift victory.

This deck aims to control the game by ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and various ramp spells, allowing for early access to powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and World Breaker. The deck also focuses on disrupting opponent's strategies with cards like Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble, while also providing card advantage with Ancient Stirrings. The inclusion of cards like Ugin's Labyrinth and Writhing Chrysalis adds additional control elements, making it difficult for opponents to deal with the deck's threats. Overall, the deck looks to dominate the game through a combination of ramp, control, and powerful Eldrazi creatures.

The deck focuses on aggressive, fast-paced gameplay with a combination of creatures with powerful abilities and burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The deck also includes cards that provide additional resources and control elements to help maintain board presence and protect against opposing threats. Additionally, the deck includes a few utility cards for flexibility in different situations. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of pressure and damage to secure a victory in a short amount of time.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Faithful Mending. By utilizing instant speed reanimation spells and disruptive cards like Force of Negation and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to control the game while setting up its combo to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Griselbrand and Ulamog, the Defiler. The key strategy is to efficiently reanimate creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure victory through a powerful and fast-paced combo.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the synergy between Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful combo. By sacrificing creatures and using cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Malevolent Rumble, the deck aims to generate a large number of +1/+1 counters on Basking Broodscale to overwhelm the opponent. Other cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Walking Ballista provide additional support and control options, while Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings help in searching for key pieces of the combo. The deck also includes various lands such as Eldrazi Temple and Grove of the Burnwillows to provide mana acceleration and color fixing.
